name: LifeCoach
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life coach
des:
Let Alexa play the role of your life coach. The Life Coach skill enables Alexa to give you tips and activities to help you have a well-rounded lifestyle. 

HOW IT WORKS
Alexa will suggest an activity and if you agree to do it then she will elaborate a little more about why the activity is helpful. She is just a coach though, so it is up to you to actually do the activity. If you don't agree to do it then she'll suggest something different and not bother you with the unwanted suggestion for 24hrs.

You can use this skill every few hours or every few days, it is really up to you how much coaching you want.

FEATURES

NO REPEATS IN 24HR PERIOD
She won't repeat the same advice in the same 24hr period. There is plenty of great tips and activities to do and if you get through them all in a day then you will be asked to have a rest and come back later for another round of activities.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Themed lifestyles as follows:
 - Chilled-out : helpful activities for those looking to relax and chill
 - Productive : useful suggestions for people on the go and trying to get things done
 - Social : handy tips to assist in the complex world of friendships and social media

We hope you enjoy using this skill and feedback is always appreciated. You can leave a review or contact steven.bowden@protonmail.com directly.

PRIVACY INFORMATION
The Life Coach skill securely stores usage data such as timestamps of each life coaching activity that is suggested to you, this is to prevent repetitive suggestions and provide a more streamlined user experience. Data collected by this skill is only used to facilitate the skill functionality and monitor the application performance. Data is not shared with any third party. No personally identifiable information is required by this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
